files.title: Overview
files.summary: Optionally, during the copy, a vector of 4-bit and 6-bit custom floating point types can be decompressed into 8-bit types.

files.title: 9.7.16.9.1.1. Decompression of 4-bit floating point to 8-bit type
files.summary: A contiguous set of 16 elements of 4-bits each followed by 8 bytes of padding can be converted into 16 elements of 8-bits each as shown in [Figure 194](https://docs.nvidia.com/cuda/parallel-thread-execution/#tcgen05-decompression-4b8b).

files.title: 9.7.16.9.1.2. Decompression of 6-bit floating point to 8-bit type
files.summary: A contiguous set of 16 elements of 6-bits each followed by 4 bytes of padding is decompressed into 16 elements of 8-bits each as shown in [Figure 196](https://docs.nvidia.com/cuda/parallel-thread-execution/#tcgen05-decompression-6b8b).
